00021 #include "PATAssignment.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_array;
00024 
00026 #define PAT_ASSIGNMENT_NONE std::wstring(L"None")
00027 
00029 #define PAT_ASSIGNMENT_BARCODE std::wstring(L"AffyBarcode")
00030 
00032 #define PAT_ASSIGNMENT_USER_SELECTED std::wstring(L"UserSelected")
00033 
00035 #define PAT_ASSIGNMENT_OTHER std::wstring(L"Other")
00036 
00037 /*
00038  * Convert the probe array assignment type to a string.
00039  */
00040 std::wstring affymetrix_calvin_array::PATAssignmentMethodToString(PATAssignmentMethod pat)
00041 {
00042         switch (pat)
00043         {
00044         case NoAssignment:
00045                 return PAT_ASSIGNMENT_NONE;
00046                 break;
00047 
00048         case AffyBarcodeAssignment:
00049                 return PAT_ASSIGNMENT_BARCODE;
00050                 break;
00051 
00052         case UserSelectedAssignment:
00053                 return PAT_ASSIGNMENT_USER_SELECTED;
00054                 break;
00055 
00056         case OtherAssignment:
00057                 return PAT_ASSIGNMENT_OTHER;
00058                 break;
00059 
00060         default:
00061                 return L"";
00062                 break;
00063         }
00064 }
00065 
00066 /*
00067  * Convert the string to the probe array assignment type.
00068  */
00069 PATAssignmentMethod affymetrix_calvin_array::PATAssignmentMethodFromString(const std::wstring &pat)
00070 {
00071         if (pat == PAT_ASSIGNMENT_NONE)
00072         {
00073                 return NoAssignment;
00074         }
00075         else if (pat == PAT_ASSIGNMENT_BARCODE)
00076         {
00077                 return AffyBarcodeAssignment;
00078         }
00079         else if (pat == PAT_ASSIGNMENT_USER_SELECTED)
00080         {
00081                 return UserSelectedAssignment;
00082         }
00083         else if (pat == PAT_ASSIGNMENT_OTHER)
00084         {
00085                 return OtherAssignment;
00086         }
00087         else
00088         {
00089                 return NoAssignment;
00090         }
00091 }
